sqlMap.select: SELECT b.* FROM ( SELECT rownum rn, a.* from ( SELECT openindex, storename, region, category, phone, email, address, name, inquire, to_char(rdate,'yyyy/mm/dd') rdate, category2, category3, userid, DECODE(UPPER(status),'P','대기','N','거절','Y','완료') status FROM businessenter WHERE openindex IS NOT NULL AND UPPER(status)='P' ORDER BY rdate DESC) a )b WHERE rn between $s_no$ and $e_no$
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM businessenter WHERE UPPER(status)='P'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM businessenter WHERE UPPER(status)='P'

SELECT openindex, storename, region, DECODE(category,'111','한식','222','치킨','333','일식','444','양식','555','중식','666','샐러드/샌드위치','777','분식','888','카페/디저트') category, category as cateunq, phone, email, address, name, inquire, to_char(rdate,'yyyy/mm/dd') rdate, category2, category3, userid, DECODE(UPPER(status),'P','대기','N','거절','Y','완료') status FROM businessenter WHERE openindex=#openindex#
select count(*) from store where userid=#userid#
sqlMap.insert: insert into store( storeunq, cateunq, userid, storename, storephone, storeaddr, fee, rdate, minprice ) values( store_seq.nextval, #cateunq#, #userid#, #storename#, #storephone#, #storeaddr#, #fee#, sysdate, #minprice# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE businessenter SET status='Y' WHERE openindex=#openindex#
UPDATE businessenter SET status = 'N' WHERE openindex=#openindex#
